CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 12, 1946, pg. 1, reads: "Swearing in New Magistrate - Police magistrate Robert E. (Pappy) Williams takes the oath as Mayor David Lawrence swears him in as the city's first Negro magistrate, in Council Chambers, Tuesday. - Harris Photo"David L. Lawrence was Mayor of the City of Pittsburgh 1946-1959, Governor of Pennsylvania 1959-1963, and he died in 1966.
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Mayor David L. Lawrence swearing in Robert E. "Pappy" Williams as magistrate, in Pittsburgh City Council Chambers, City County Building
